//   sampler2D ShadowTexture;
//   float4 SpecularOverrideParameter;
//   float2 SpotAngles;
//   float3 SpotDirection;

// Registers:

//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1

//   UniformPixelVector_1         c8       1
//   UniformPixelVector_2         c9       1
//   UniformPixelVector_3         c10      1

//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c12      1
//   DistanceFieldParameters      c13      1
//   SpotDirection                c14      1
//   SpotAngles                   c15      1
//   SceneColorTexture            s0       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s1       1
//   ShadowTexture                s2       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c3, 1.5, 3, 0.75, 2
    def c6, 0, 2, 1, 1.5
    def c7, -9.99999997e-007, 15, 1.20000005, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 v1.xy
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v4.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v5.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

// Unreal Engine SceneColorTexture halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --fix-unreal-halo-sct --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 CRC32_63517A83_1070.txt
mov r30.xyyw, v5.xyyw
texldl r31, c220.z, s15
add r31.w, r30.w, -r31.y
mad r30.x, r31.w, r31.x, r30.x

    dp3 r0.x, v3, v3
    rsq r0.y, r0.x
    mul r0.yzw, r0.y, v3.xxyz
    dp3 r0.y, r0.yzww, -c14
    add r0.y, r0.y, -c15.x
    mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, c15.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.y
    add r0.z, -r0.x, c6.z
    mov_sat r0.x, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, c6.z
    pow r1.x, r0.x, c12.w
    texld_pp r2, v0, s2
    add r0.x, r2.x, c13.x
    mul_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x, c13.y
    pow_pp r1.y, r0.x, c13.z
    mul r0.x, r0.z, r1.y
    mul r2, r0.y, r0.x
    mov r3, r2
    texkill r3
    rcp r0.x, v5.w
    mul r0.xz, r0.x, v5.xyyw
    mad r3.xy, r0.xzzw, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r3.zw, c6.x
    texldl r3, r3, s0
    mov r0.zw, c6
    add r0.x, r0.z, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r3.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, -c2.x, r0.x, -v5.w
    rcp r1.z, c11.z
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, r1.z
    mad r1.zw, v1.xyxy, r0.w, c9.xyxy
    texld r3, r1.zwzw, s1
    mul r0.w, r3_abs.w, r3_abs.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, r0.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, r3_abs.w
    add r1.z, r3_abs.w, c7.x
    cmp r0.w, r1.z, r0.w, c6.x
    mov r4, c3
    mad r1.zw, v1.xyxy, r4, c10.xyxy
    texld r5, r1.zwzw, s1
    mul r1.z, r5_abs.w, r5_abs.w
    mul r1.z, r1.z, r1.z
    mul r1.z, r1.z, r5_abs.w
    add r1.w, r5_abs.w, c7.x
    add r2.xyz, r3, r5
    cmp r1.z, r1.w, r1.z, c6.x
    lrp r3.x, r0.w, r1.z, r0.w
    dp3 r0.w, v4, v4
    rsq r0.w, r0.w
    mad r1.z, v4.z, -r0.w, c6.z
    mul r3.yzw, r0.w, v4.xxyz
    cmp r0.w, r3.w, r1_abs.z, c6.z
    mad r3.yzw, r3.w, c6.xxxy, -r3
    add r1.z, r0.w, c7.x
    pow r1.w, r0.w, c7.z
    cmp r0.w, r1.z, r1.w, c6.x
    add r0.w, r0.w, c11.y
    mad r0.x, r0.w, r0.x, r3.x
    add r0.w, -r3_abs.y, c6.z
    mul r5.w, r0.w, r0.x
    mad r0.xw, v1.xyzy, r4.xyzy, c8.xyzy
    texld r4, r0.xwzw, s1
    add r2.xyz, r2, r4
    add r0.xzw, r0.z, -c0.xyyz
    mul_pp r0.xzw, r0, r2.xyyz
    mad_pp r0.xzw, r0, c4.w, c4.xyyz
    nrm_pp r2.xyz, v2
    mov_sat_pp r1.z, r2.z
    dp3_sat_pp r1.w, r3.yzww, r2
    mul r0.xzw, r0, r1.z
    add r1.z, r1.z, c7.x
    cmp r0.xzw, r1.z, r0, c6.x
    pow_pp r2.x, r1.w, c7.y
    add r1.z, r1.w, c7.x
    mul_pp r2.xyz, r2.x, c5
    cmp_pp r2.xyz, r1.z, r2, c6.x
    add_pp r0.xzw, r0, r2.xyyz
    mul_pp r0.xzw, r1.y, r0
    mul r0.xzw, r0, c12.xyyz
    mul r0.xzw, r1.x, r0
    mul r5.xyz, r0.y, r0.xzww
    cmp oC0, -r2.w, c6.x, r5

// approximately 94 instruction slots used (6 texture, 88 arithmetic)
